description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SMalaria for IMMZ.D18.S.Malaria schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a malaria vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: 4-dose schedule
